name: Kooyii
0:
”Alexa, Open curtain”
”Alexa, Turn on Night mode”
”Alexa, Turn off Switch one”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Now you can use Kooyii to control your Kooyii Smarthome devices! 

1) Download Kooyii from App Store or Google Play Store
2) Create a new account and log in
3) Follow the instructions to add your Kooyii smart device
4) Use your Kooyii's email and password and click "Link in"
